content: Growth in these segments is undoubtedly related to our increased relevance and these customer groups have the highest stated likelihood of increasing usage at restaurants, especially during the breakfast daypart. Our scale is an advantage here and as the leader in dining, we continue to see a long runway ahead. Just one week ago, we unveiled our holiday menu, which includes a Braised Barbacoa Breakfast Burrito and Gingerbread Spiced Donuts.
